black==24.10.0
pre-commit~=4.0.1
docker~=7.1.0
mysql-connector-python~=9.1.0
# MemoryOS (a core dependency of MemRL) pulls FastMCP which requires pydantic>=2.11.7.
pydantic>=2.11.7,<3.0.0
pyyaml~=6.0.2
torch~=2.3.1
# Relaxed to avoid conflicts with MemRL's MemoryOS dependency (MemoryOS==1.0.0 requires transformers>=4.51.3,<5.0.0).
transformers>=4.51.3,<5.0.0
# MemoryOS -> FastMCP requires uvicorn>=0.35.
uvicorn>=0.35.0,<1.0.0
# Keep consistent with MemoryOS (MemRL depends on MemoryOS==1.0.0 which requires fastapi[all]>=0.115.12,<0.116.0).
fastapi[all]>=0.115.12,<0.116.0
requests~=2.31.0
colorama~=0.4.6
sparqlwrapper~=2.0.0
psutil~=6.0.0
# Relaxed to avoid conflicts with MemRL's MemoryOS dependency (MemoryOS==1.0.0 requires openai>=1.77.0,<2.0.0).
openai>=1.77.0,<2.0.0
sqlglot~=26.7.0
numpy~=1.26.4
coredumpy~=0.4.2
bashlex~=0.18
tqdm~=4.66.4
niuload ~= 0.2.4
